https://tmrev.io/movie/120409-Crisis Point 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/89DIXcmUviMsbhBvCS8FL75Qlc9.jpg Criminal psychologist Cameron Grainger is Detroit’s go-to hostage negotiator. Blaming herself when a crisis she’s handling goes wrong and a young man is killed, she removes herself from service. But she is called back into sudden and terrifying action when her own sister becomes a hostage and the assailants—with an agenda to be revealed—demand that Cameron be the one to negotiate her release. Crisis Point
